actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend section 1408 of title 10, United States Code, to eliminate certain reductions from the amount of retired or retainer pay which a spouse or former spouse of a member of the uniformed services is entitled to receive as a result of any court order.

summary.text: Amends provisions concerning the payment of military pensions in compliance with court orders pursuant to divorce or separation to eliminate certain reductions from those pensions when the amounts available for such compliance are determined.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1408 of title 10, United States Code, to eliminate certain reductions from the amount of retired or retainer pay which a spouse or former spouse of a member of the uniformed services is entitled to receive as a result of any court order.
